title: Who are the 12 tribes of Israel? Which tribe of Israel did Jesus descend from? - Quora

response.answer_text: The 12 tribes of Israel, as listed in Genesis 49, are: ReubenSimeonLeviJudahZebulunIssacharDanGadAsherNaphtaliJosephBenjaminJesus is a descendant of Judah, the fourth son of Jacob. His genealogy is listed both in Matthew 1 and in Luke 3. Hebrew 7:14 says: For it is evident that our Lord was descended from Judah, and in connection with that tribe Moses said nothing about priests. Revelation 5:5 says: And one of the elders said to me, “Weep no more; behold, the Lion of the tribe of Judah, the Root of David, has conquered, so that he can open the scroll and its seven seals.”

There were actually 13 tribes of Israel. People do not include Levi as they were not given territory in Israel. They were split and given certain cities in each tribal area from which to guide that tribe in religious matters etc. But they were a tribe. The tribes were NOT all Jacobs sons. When in Egypt Jacob excluded Joseph from being a tribe as he had married the daughter of an Egyptian Priest and had become part Egyptian. Instead, Jacob ‘adopted’ Josephs 2 sons (from his Egyptian marriage) as his own sons. Thus Ephraim and Manasseh became tribes in Israel. Any other sons Joseph might have in the future would remain his. Of course it’s all fictional
